short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Institutional-grade solution for DeFi access from your browser
short.zh_CN: The game-changing wallet for Ethereum and all EVM chains

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fireblocks Browser Extension enables customers to easily access dApps while protecting their trading operations with Fireblocks MPC wallet security, governance policies, and integrated DeFi threat detection. The Browser Extension provides an intuitive interface to view Vault balances, transaction history, and connected dApps with in-depth transaction details for enhanced clarity before signing on the Fireblocks mobile app.
